TopicTitle: Industrial Flames & Explosions, Inc. - Version 1.4.2 Now Available!

Articles.Content:
Do you plan on making an Orion crew adapter for the SLS?

Also, couldn\'t payload fairings be rigged as lander legs, which would come open, but not come off?

So that they fold open with the g key? Might work.
Why you donÂ´t add the orion capsule in this update.

Do you plan on making an Orion crew adapter for the SLS?

Yes.

Also, couldn\'t payload fairings be rigged as lander legs, which would come open, but not come off?

They could, but it wouldn\'t make much sense, since payload fairings should be jettisoned. I see this being more of an option for decouplers, not fairings.

Why you donÂ´t add the orion capsule in this update.

Because it\'s not finished. Yes, the models and basic textures are done, but I still need to tweak everything.

Hey I.F.E. is your awesome Orion Space Craft being released this weekend or next weekend

and dose the solar array retract and extend.

Hey I.F.E. is your awesome Orion Space Craft being released this weekend or next weekend

and dose the solar array retract and extend.

It\'ll be released when I release it, and yes, they do retract and extend.
OH boy i can\'t wait man your are the best
How is the progress IFE
Meteorite 101, stop doing that. I don\'t think Jordan appreciates it.
your right
UPDATE?
UPDATE?

By far one of my favorte Add-on rockets. The staging is really flawless. Unless of course, you are like me, who damages the lunar landing booster on liftoff, and it flies off in the 3rd stage. Still unaware of this, I come to a steady, but fast decent over the Mun. The rest, well, is somewhere in a smoldering crater.
Hey just wanted to let you know I love your Atlas V model!! I\'m using it in a video for my senior design project, and I\'m giving you credit. Gonna post it here soon. Thank you so much!!!

I am not good at building crafts, so I like very much this approach of giving pre-built rockets for specific purposes.

I\'ll try this pack very soon.

Thanks

Maraz
I really like this! I\'ve .cfg edited the Altair SAS to an ASAS, and stuck a mechjeb on it, and it works beautifully. Can\'t wait for your take on the Orion pod!
Are there going to be any new rockets soon? ( :3 spoilers pweash)
All of rockets start to go sideways (very noticeably) shortly after takeoff, anyone else having this?

All of rockets start to go sideways (very noticeably) shortly after takeoff, anyone else having this?

It works well for me. What kind of designs did you build?

Edit: It is possible that the rocket is too heavy, or the weight isn\'t distributed well. Using multiple SAS and ASAS modules can also cause problems if there are too many of them, or if they aren\'t placed well.

It works well for me. What kind of designs did you build?

Edit: It is possible that the rocket is too heavy, or the weight isn\'t distributed well. Using multiple SAS and ASAS modules can also cause problems if there are too many of them, or if they aren\'t placed well.

I was just using the stock SLS rocket and a few others. No modifications or anything.

I was just using the stock SLS rocket and a few others. No modifications or anything.

I never use stock rockets, so I had to check, but you were right, some of them are a bit unstable, they need manual correction, otherwise they get off from track, but I had no problem inserting them to orbit.
Any word on the Aurora spaceplane?
I have to give you the NdGT award for an awesome mod!

All of rockets start to go sideways (very noticeably) shortly after takeoff, anyone else having this?

The SLS400 tends to the left for me, even with sas on. Maybe because of the asymmetric design of the fuel tank?
The SLS is best rocket. Making 2 Mun landings and 1 Kerbal return is AWESOME. 8) Thanks for the mod, VERY helpful!
The saved ones that come with it, the ones with the big top, always fold over and explode when i launch. :\'(
